ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Yes, I would recommend it. It's a great course to get an overview of past and contemporary thinkers relating to concepts such as sovereignty, cosmopolitanism, and human rights.
Theoretical look at the role international institutions play in international relations.

I would recommend the course, but would say that a prior knowledge of political science or international relations methods and scholarship is definitely a strong advantage. The course covered enormous ground, which was a huge advantage and another reason to recommend it.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course allowed me to explore some topics more deeply that I have been interested in for a while. Thanks to Professor Benhabib and Yale for offering it!
